title: (x) Bold sans used on FontShop.com pages - FF Meta Headline {Stephen}
content:
Hey all...

ill probably kick myself once i figure it out.

[http://www.fontshop.com/support/installation.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20110521102024/http:/www.fontshop.com/support/installation.php)

its the white bold/black sans type in the black boxes that im after...

i particularly love the lowercase g!
author: thetruebeliever

comments.content: Actually, this is [FF Meta Headline](http://web.archive.org/web/20110521102024/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_meta_headline_ot/), which is used often on FontShop.com pages. Note the tighter fit and smaller tails on the 'a' and 'l'.
